bug.author: monacv
bug.description: Could you please make the installation screenshots in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/CMU-Perceptual-Computing-Lab/openpose/blob/master/doc/installation/README.md>https://github.com/CMU-Perceptual-Computing-Lab/openpose/blob/master/doc/installation/README.md</denchmark-link> available again?
